DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no/unknown  indicator that asks whether the patient or the patient's legally acceptable representative provided written authorization to allow the use and disclosure of their protected health information.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to patient authorization of confidential information.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: Decision of the competent authorities in form of a letter, document, or verbal or electronic form, that confirms that somebody has permission to do something or be somewhere, e.g. to realize a given project.:No value exists.

Concepts.definition: Decision of the competent authorities in form of a letter, document, or verbal or electronic form, that confirms that somebody has permission to do something or be somewhere, e.g. to realize a given project.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Patient or the patient's lega
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient or the patient's legally acceptable representative must provide written authorization to allow the use and disclosure of their protected health information

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient provided written authorization permitting release of personal health information

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: If the patient is being treated in the U.S., Have they signed an authorization permitting release of personal health information?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF_Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient or a legally authorized representative provided study-specific informed consent prior to study entry and authorization permitting release of personal health information?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text_1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient or a legally authorized representative provided study-specific informed consent prior to study entry and, for patients treated in the U.S., authorization permitting release of personal health information?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the participant provided study-specific informed consent prior to study entry and authorization permitting release of personal health information?

DataElement.origin: ACOSOG CRF:American College of Surgeons Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElement.changeDescription: Replaced VD Assessment Ind-3 (2018441v1) with VD Yes No Unknown Indicator (3506034v1) - dbw
